pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, December 17, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

8:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will make a virtual announcement with the Premier of Newfoundland and Labrador, Andrew Furey. President of the Queen's Privy Council for Canada and Minister of Intergovernmental Affairs Dominic LeBlanc and Minister of Natural Resources Seamus O'Regan will be in attendance.

The announcement will be streamed live on the Prime Minister’s official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/CanadianPM.

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet virtually with front line workers of the Canadian Red Cross currently serving in residential and long-term care centres across Quebec.

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual candle lighting ceremony in celebration of Hanukkah, and deliver brief remarks.

Closed to media.
